title: Panic during build

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust // my crate timg@2.0.0 to timg@2.0.1 ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.68.0 (2c8cc3432 2023-03-06) binary: rustc commit-hash: 2c8cc343237b8f7d5a3c3703e3a87f2eb2c54a74 commit-date: 2023-03-06 host: aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.68.0 LLVM version: 15.0.6 ``` This seems to be an accident, I don't know how to reproduce it, I just tried to submit it. ### Error output ``` lrne@localhost[/home/lrne/Project/Rust/timg/] [000] 10:35:44 $ cargo build --release Compiling timg v2.0.1 (/home/lrne/Project/Rust/timg) Finished release [optimized] target(s) in 3.45s lrne@localhost[/home/lrne/Project/Rust/timg/] [000] 10:35:51 $ cargo build warning: Failed to garbage collect finalized incremental compilation session directory `/home/lrne/Project/Rust/timg/target/debug/incremental/timg-l42gz9zalivh/s-gk693ol6d6-4h7luj-2deeqmhvmgc96`: No such file or directory (os error 2) warning: `timg` (lib) generated 1 warning Compiling timg v2.0.1 (/home/lrne/Project/Rust/timg) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'failed to open bitcode file `/home/lrne/Project/Rust/timg/target/debug/incremental/timg-31inqbvbag9er/s-gk697u0c8z-1bmdhar-working/stvq58nujdg7h3b.pre-lto.bc`: Too many levels of symbolic links (os error 40)', /rustc/2c8cc343237b8f7d5a3c3703e3a87f2eb2c54a74/compiler/rustc_codegen_ssa/src/back/write.rs:1984:29 stack backtrace: 0: 0x74f01a6150 - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::hf81ef7bc29176a13 at /rustc/2c8cc343237b8f7d5a3c3703e3a87f2eb2c54a74/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:93:5 1: 0x74f01a6150 - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::trace_unsynchronized::hbcc34bc9228962ba at /rustc/2c8cc343237b8f7d5a3c3703e3a87f2eb2c54a74/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/mod.rs:66:5 2: 0x74f01a6150 - 31: 0x0 - error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.68.0 (2c8cc3432 2023-03-06) running on aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: --crate-type bin -C opt-level=1 -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C debug-assertions=on -C incremental=[REDACTED] note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: end of query stack error: could not compile `timg` lrne@localhost[/home/lrne/Project/Rust/timg/] [101] 10:35:55 $ ```
